description: The Penguins eliminated the Senators with a Chris Kunitz goal in double overtime.
title: Penguins advance to Stanley Cup Final with thrilling double-OT victory in Game 7 | FOX Sports

author: Cork Gaines
description: Friday's top plays are the Chris Kunitz double-overtime goal, LeBron James passing Michael Jordan, and Kyrie Irving's moves.
title: The 3 plays in sports everybody will be talking about today

author: Craig CustanceESPN Senior Writer
description: Chris Kunitz's second goal of the game was the difference as the Penguins squeezed past the resilient Senators in double overtime. They now are four wins away from their second straight Stanley Cup finals win, but the Predators stand in their way.
title: Penguins barely sneak into finals

author: WILL GRAVES
description: PITTSBURGH (AP) â€” Chris Kunitz spent a portion of the spring nursing a lower-body injury and wondering if his time with the Pittsburgh Penguins was over. The veteran forward's contract is up this summer and he's been around long enough to know how these things go, particularly when you're 37. "It's not fun thinking about the future," Kunitz said. He found a pretty compelling way to put it off for at least four more games and push his team to the brink of history in the process.
title: Kunitz's double-OT goal sends Penguins back to Stanley Cup
